lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius, the double-amputee sprinter who was barred from competition with able-bodied athletes in January, will present his appeal to the Court of Arbitration for Sport at a hearing on April 29 and 30, he announced Tuesday.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius, the double-amputee sprinter who was barred from competition with able-bodied athletes in January, will present his appeal to the Court of Arbitration for Sport at a hearing on April 29 and 30, he announced Tuesday.
